quest.name: The Very Hungry Marid
journal:
Eshana would have you tend to a marid.

objectives: Obtain animal fodder at Castellum Velodyna.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: If you have a moment, we have a marid that wantsss for attention. An old creature that's extremely wary of people.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: It refuses to warm to us, missstrusting any food we bring it, which often leaves it hungry and irritable. However, the captain believes that it will open up to a good-hearted sssoul such as you.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: At the chocobo stables, you will find pilesss of fodder. Pray take some to the marid eassst of the bridge, where it tends to keep its own company. My thanks in advance.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The old marid regards you with wary eyes. You should return with its fodder.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The old marid regards you with wary eyes even as it sniffs at you curiously.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The old marid devours the fodder in moments and begins sniffing about for more. Perhaps another delivery is in order.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The old marid sniffs about for more fodder. Perhaps another delivery is in order.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The old marid sniffs at you expectantly.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The old marid works through the fodder with relative restraint before settling down, looking content. As best you can judge, it has had its fill.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The marid appears to have had its fill. Time to report back to Eshana.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Ssso, how fared you? Did the old marid eat any fodder?

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: ...Well, a second helping! It appears the captain's instinctsss were true. Now we know to whom we might turn for future feedings.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: As you will have noticed, it is quite old and frail. Yet its sense of sssmell remains remarkably keen, sssecond to none even amongst its kind.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Recognizing this, the captain had it brought here. With its nose for suspicious sssubstances, it has been an absssolute boon to our efforts.
